RELIGION

Selva Vinayagar Temple: Pradosha puja 4.30 p.m., Bhairavar puja, Railway Colony, 6 p.m.

Panniru Tirumurai Mandram: Pann Isai by S.S. Mohanram, Adi Street, 7 a.m., Discourse on ‘Periapuranam’ by N.S. Sundararaman, No. 26 Pandian Street, Sundar Nagar, Tirunagar 5 p.m.

Tiruvalluvar Kazhagam: 27{+t}{+h}anniversary celebrations of Youth Literary festival, SP. Tirupathi presides, North Adi Street, Meenakshi Sundareswarar Temple, 7 p.m.

Ramakrishna Mutt: Discourse on ‘Bhagwan Sri Ramanarin Vaalvum Vaakum’ by Dr. Kalarani Rangasamy, 5.45 p.m., aarathi, New Natham Road, 6.30 p.m.

Prajapita Brahmakumaris Ishwariya Vishwa Vidyalaya: Amarnath Lingam darshan, Victoria Edward Hall, West Veli Street 7 a.m., Kedarnath Lingam darshan, 408 North Masi Street 7 a.m. and 4 p.m.

Sringeri Sarada Peetham: Pradosha puja, No. 88 Amman Sannidhi Street, 6 p.m.

Sri Swami Tatwananda Ashram: Upanishad class by Swami Samanandar, P and T Nagar, 6.45 p.m.

Chaplain The American College: Sunday Vesper service, Rev. Dr. W. Samuel Soundarapandian, Dr. S. Wellington leads, Jubilee Chapel, 6 p.m.

Church of Christ: Sunday service, Bro. Deva Manickam and M. S. Raja conduct, Viswasapuri, Gnanaolivupuram, 10 a.m. and 6 p.m.

CULTURE

Universal Peace Sanchiary: Free meditation class by Sathguru Sundaramoorthi Sachidananda, No. 138 Kamarajar Road, Mariamman Teppakulam, 7 p.m.

International Sivananda Yoga Vedanta Centre: Yoga and meditation classes; 444 KK Nagar East Ninth Street, 6 a.m., 6.30 p.m., 10 a.m. and 4 p.m. (for women).

Prajapita Brahmakumaris Ishwariya Vishwa Vidyalaya: Free rajayoga meditation classes; 36 Meenakshi Nagar P and T Nagar; 40 Sambandamoorthy Street, 47 B CMR Road and 357 Anna Nagar, 6.30 a.m. and 5.30 p.m.

Arsha Parampara: Mundakopanishad 7 a.m. and Bhaja Govindam, Yagasalai Andalpuram, 6.30 p.m., Lalitha Sahasranamam and spiritual heritage classes by Swamini Vidyananda Saraswathi, Old Kalyana Mandapam, Meenakshi Temple, 10 a.m.

Sri Aurobindo Study Forum: Sath sang on Sri Aurobindo’s ‘Life divine’ by Prof. Subramony, Nithyatha, Aurolab, Veerapanchan, 10 a.m.

GENERAL

Vivekananda College: One-day special camp by ‘Appar Swamigal uzhavara kuzhu’ Pon Perumal Temple Vadipatti, 8 a.m. and 5 p.m., NSS volunteers to attend camp, college campus, 6 a.m. and 5 p.m.

Thiagarajar College: NSS camp, Silaiman panchayat, 9 a.m.

JCI Madurai Dynamic: World Women’s Day celebration in association with Agrini Enclave Houses and Flat Owners’ Association, Selvi Santhosham, Head Administrator, TVS Schools, chief guest, S.V. Sankara Narayanan, zone president, JCI India, guest of honour, Near Agrini Park, 4 p.m.

The Humanist Club: International Women’s Day, short films, IGSR Hall, Gandhi Museum, 10.30 a.m.

Galileo Science Centre: One-day science workshop for students and teachers, Maniammai Primary School, North Masi Street, 10 a.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous: Meeting, Justice Krishna Iyer Community Hall, 7 p.m., Alfred Noble Mat. HSS, Tirunagar, 8{+t}{+h}bus stop, 11 a.m.

MELUR

Alcoholics Anonymous: Meeting, R.C. School, Sivaganga Road, Melur, 6.30 p.m.
